en_US.subject: You have received a new balloon share
en_US.body:
Hi {user.username},
{node.shareowner.name} has shared a balloon collection [{node.sharename}] with you.

de_CH.subject: Du hast eine neue balloon Freigabe erhalten
de_CH.body:
Hallo {user.username},
{node.shareowner.name} hat eine neue Freigabe [{node.sharename}] mit dir geteilt.
